entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse DID U KNOW DEATHS UNDER TRUMP'S WATCH ARE THROUGH THE ROOF?  At last count, 27+% of all Coronavirus deaths are here even though our population is about 4.3% of the Worlds.  

DUE TO HIS FAILURE TO QUICKLY & FULLY TAKE COMMAND, INCL. TESTING, I BLAME MANY OF THESE DEATHS ON TRUMP.
